title: MediatR behaviors
metaDescription: MediatR is a popular .NET library for in-process messaging.
keywordText: mediatr jimmy bogart mediator .net c# tech
brief: [MediatR](https://github.com/jbogard/MediatR) is a popular **.NET** library for *in-process messaging*. It offers various tools to alter the *behavior* of *requests* with shared logic.
author: Ladislav Prix
